description: A dashboard that monitors Envoy with a focus on giving an generic overview. The dashboards were generated using [envoy-mixin](https://github.com/adinhodovic/envoy-mixin). Open issues and create feature requests in the repository.

panels.description: The total number of Envoy pods being monitored.
panels.title: Envoy Pods

panels.description: The total number of upstreams being monitored.
panels.title: Upstreams

panels.description: The total number of downstreams being monitored.
panels.title: Downstreams

panels.description: The total number of active upstream connections across all Envoy clusters being monitored.
panels.title: Upstream Active Connections

panels.description: The total number of active downstream connections across all Envoy clusters being monitored.
panels.title: Downstream Active Connections

panels.description: The percentage of healthy members in the Envoy clusters being monitored.
panels.title: Membership Healthy Percent

panels.description: The distribution of upstream request rates by Envoy cluster name.
panels.title: Upstream Rate by Envoy Cluster Name [1h]

panels.description: The distribution of upstream request rates by response code class.
panels.title: Upstream Rate by Code Class [1h]

panels.description: The distribution of downstream request rates by Envoy HTTP connection manager prefix.
panels.title: Downstream Rate by Envoy HTTP Conn Manager Prefix [1h]

panels.description: The distribution of upstream request rates by pod.
panels.title: Upstream Rate by Pod [1h]

panels.description: The upstream request rate over time.
panels.title: Upstream Rate

panels.description: The upstream latency percentiles over time.
panels.title: Upstream Latency

panels.description: The upstream success rate over time, counting 5xx response codes as errors.
panels.title: Upstream Success Rate (Excluding 4xx errors)

panels.description: The upstream success rate over time, counting 4xx and 5xx response codes as errors.
panels.title: Upstream Success Rate (Including 4xx errors)

panels.description: An overview table showing various upstream metrics by Envoy cluster name [1h].
panels.title: Upstream Overview [1h]

panels.description: The downstream request rate by Envoy HTTP connection manager prefix over time.
panels.title: Downstream Rate by Envoy HTTP Conn Manager Prefix

panels.description: The downstream latency percentiles over time.
panels.title: Downstream Latency

panels.description: The downstream success rate over time, counting 5xx response codes as errors.
panels.title: Downstream Success Rate (Excluding 4xx errors)

panels.description: The downstream success rate over time, counting 4xx and 5xx response codes as errors.
panels.title: Downstream Success Rate (Including 4xx errors)

panels.description: An overview table showing various downstream metrics by Envoy HTTP connection manager prefix [1h].
panels.title: Downstream Overview [1h]

panels.description: The SSL certificate expiration times by Envoy TLS certificate over time.
panels.title: SSL Expirations by Envoy TLS Certificate

title: Envoy / Overview
